Straight answers to complicated questions.

You have a problem that doesn't fit in a standard box. You need someone to trace the root cause and hand you the fix.

Weird Question Hotline
Click to email me your weird question. Once I see it, I'll respond and start working on it within the hour.
Or inspect the mechanism ↓
DIAGNOSTIC CHECK
  • [ ] You have plenty of data, but no narrative.
  • [ ] You suspect the "technical" issue is actually "people."
  • [ ] You want the truth, even if it's annoying.
SYSTEM REJECTION CRITERIA
  • [!] You are looking for a "Yes Man" to validate bad data.
  • [!] You care more about optics than operations.
  • [!] You aren't authorized to implement the fix.

OPERATIONAL PARAMETERS
Security

All communications encrypted. Non-Disclosure Agreements signed upon request.

Modality

Async default. Sync only when critical. I work on the problem, not on the call.

Ownership

You own the output. I own the method. All IP transfers on payment.
